name: Divider
description: A divider component from Fluent UI that provides visual separation between content sections with optional text labels.

props.name: children
props.description: Optional text content to display in the divider

props.name: alignContent
props.description: Alignment of the content within the divider

props.name: inset
props.description: Whether the divider should have inset spacing

props.name: vertical
props.description: Whether the divider should be oriented vertically
